wikipedia_page.main: Major John Edgar Grahame Vivian MC and Bar (28 October 1919 – 10 July 2015) was a British Army officer who won the Military Cross in Burma in 1944 and again in Malaya in 1956. He later served as an officer in the army of the Sultan of Oman.

response: *Grahame Vivian, 95, British army officer.Major Grahame Vivian - obituary
